entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM THURSDAY TO 6 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches, with the higher amounts along and south of Interstate 90. * WHERE...Northern Campbell County.

entry.title: Winter Storm Warning issued November 22 at 1:07PM MST until November 24 at 12:00PM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM THURSDAY TO NOON MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 9 inches. * WHERE...Southern Campbell County. * WHEN...From 2 AM Thursday to noon MST Friday.

entry.title: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 22 at 1:07PM MST until November 24 at 12:00PM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM THURSDAY TO NOON MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...The Weston County Plains. * WHEN...From 5 AM Thursday to noon MST Friday.

entry.title: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 22 at 1:07PM MST until November 24 at 12:00PM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM THURSDAY TO NOON MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...The Newcastle Area. * WHEN...From 5 AM Thursday to noon MST Friday.
